title: Should I be worried?
body:
During champ select my computer overheated and shut down as i was stupid and left something over the vents.

I logged back on and i got a warning that i had left a game and that I now have a 5-6 minute timer before i can play another game. Which I understand and am actually glad riot put that feature in.
I am just curious as I have never left a game before, will this screw me up??

replies.body:
Hey there,

You've got nothing to worry about, leaving one or two games shouldnt cause you any issues and your leaver level will return to normal over time.

For more information on the Leaverbuster system please see the [Leaverbuster FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)
